---
title: "People"
type: html
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
people <- read_csv("media/People.csv")

```

```{r}
people %>%
  mutate(ImageTag = paste0('<img src="', ImgPath, '" alt="Headshot of ', Name, '" style="width:100px;">')) %>%
  pmap(function(Name, Role, University, Group, ImgPath, ImageTag) {
    html_output <- glue::glue('
      <div class="person">
        {ImageTag}
        <h3>{Name}</h3>
        <p>{Role}</p>
        <p>{University}</p>
        <p>{Group}</p>
      </div>
    ')
    knitr::asis_output(html_output)
  }) %>%
  walk(identity)  # Ensures output is handled correctly

```
